name: HES Administrator
description:
WoodKSS is currently looking for a HES Administrator to join our team in Tengiz.

Responsibilities:

  • Administrate support for office and site safety activities for the project/client/customer
  • Support with Safety Task Planning with project scope of work
  • Support HES manager in daily management task and duties
  • Conduct safety meetings, orientations along with training to assure employees understand the hazards associated with scope of work
  • Administrate Emergency Response system
  • Maintain HSE records and associated documentation
  • Responsible for safety administration, risk management and controlling issues that may impact project safety
  • Work closely with site HES teams to support them with corporate framework.
  • Maintain communications with Onshore HES with project status/issues
  • Assist in Incident Investigations & Root Cause Analysis
  • Ensure safe work procedures are being followed in respect to OSHA and Client/Company Policy along with applicable regulatory and laws in Kazakhstan.
  • Assist in day to day safety matters on the project which may include medical and security issues
  • Ensure all reporting is done in a timely response
  • Perform other duties and task as requested in regards to supporting the project
  • Complete weekly reporting
  • Experienced with spreadsheets and standard templates
  • Able to work as a member of a team
  • Organisational ability
  • Knowledge of oil and gas industry practices
  • Good knowledge of ROK legislation in respect to HSE
  • A strong commitment to high quality customer service and commitment to continuous improvement
  • Knowledge HES management system
  • Good analytical and reporting skills
  • Candidates must have in depth knowledge of Kazakhstan Safety Regulations along with knowledge of Kazakhstan Guidelines
  • Candidates must be able to provide current certifications and proof of training
  • Candidate must have strong knowledge of safety protocols for general industry and new construction projects
  • Primary functions will include reporting, communications and data recording

key_skills.name: Minimum 3 years' experience in HES roles
Presentation skills, Safety instructor experience would be an advantage
